snippet: The Seattle Police Department said Wednesday it was investigating the death of a 16-year-old Muslim boy who died on Saturday after a fall from a balcony near Seattle Central College.
abstract: Police investigate death of Seattle Central College student Hamza Warsame, who fell from balcony; some have alleged that Warsame, Somali-American, was beaten and pushed to his death by white man.
lead_paragraph: The Seattle Police Department said Wednesday it was investigating the death of a 16-year-old Muslim boy who died on Saturday after a fall from a balcony near Seattle Central College.

headline.main: Assertions of Hate Crime in Seattle After a Somali-American Teenager Falls to His Death
headline.print_headline: Assertions of Hate Crime in Seattle After a Somali-American Teenager Falls to His Death
